title: The Cigar Authority meets the Godfather
itunes:title: The Cigar Authority meets the Godfather
description:
The Cigar Authority welcomes the Godfather of New England  Cigar, Don Decapot from Fuente Newman, discussing everything from Opus x to Brick House and everything in between.  The boys try out the all new BRICK HOUSE and a size not released yet called MIGHTY MIGHTY, as well as the new Arturo Fuente Rosado Sungrown Magnum R. 

Dave and Tommy also share the latest good, bad and ugly in all things Cigar. Sit back, light up, and enjoy the show!
